data.text:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

Youâve been called in to solve a strange murder in one of the most unique locales imaginable, a traveling carnival. No witnesses have yet come forward, and everyone denies knowing the victim, but are they hiding something? These folks sure do know how to keep secrets, so youâll have to dig deep to squeeze any information from this close-knit community.

â¢ MURDER BECOMES THE MAIN ATTRACTION

Is there an impostor in the midst? Someone must be lying about this terrible crime, but your partner doesnât seem capable of flushing out the killer. Looks like itâs up to you to make sure the culprit is brought to justice!

â¢ WHAT SECRETS LIE UNDER THE BIG TOP?

Find all the hidden clues in a variety of spectacular hidden object scenes.

â¢ USE YOUR FORENSIC KIT TO STUDY THE SCENE

Crack the case by solving spooky puzzles and bizarre mini-games.

â¢ SOLVE A SHOCKING NEW CASE IN THE BONUS GAME

Foil another murderer and enjoy additional Collectorâs Edition exclusives including collectible Scales, interactive evidence board, special achievements, and more!

Rathman ,

What a MESS!

Ok, I will give them an "A" for graphics and for trying to create an interesting game. However, this fell way short. I felt like I was being tossed around from scene to scene ... It just had absolutely NO flow. The text disappeared so fast, I was barely able to read it. Objects were sometimes impossible to place. I knew they belonged where they were going, but I couldn't get them in. At one point it took me 5 minutes to get the object where I wanted. I found a lot of the puzzles "glitchy" and irritating. I paid for the game, so I forced myself to finish. But I have to say, I found myself wanting this game to end not even a quarter of the way through. Recently any game I have purchased from EIPIX has been a huge disappointment for me.
